name: Pull Request
about: Submit a new example or improvement
---

## What does this PR do?
<!-- Brief description of the change -->

## Type
- [ ] New example program
- [ ] Bug fix in existing example
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Build/tooling improvement

## Checklist
- [ ] Code compiles with `ocamlopt -o <name> <name>.ml`
- [ ] Program runs without errors
- [ ] Code includes comments explaining OCaml concepts
- [ ] Example output is shown in comments or `let () = ...` block
- [ ] Makefile updated if adding a new `.ml` file
